name: mycelius
description:
Ants have started attacking your base, and you need to fight back!

The aim of mycelius is to grow your territory to both defend your base, and to later on defeat the ant hill. 

The web version's audio can be a bit stuttery, so I recommend downloading the Windows Build if that is an issue for you.

The OST can be accessed in the project files, under assets/music.
